subject: Help Pedals
description_text:
Hello. I've been having a lot of issues with your pedals.

1. The pedal base isn't compatible with one of the most common racing
cockpits...
2. It doesn't work on any games and the guids in the app are
completely wrong. How to fix, or how to return ASAP

conversations.body_text: Hi RAZZID,  Could you please send us a photo of your bracket so we can see which part doesn’t fit? Also, if you’re having any issues with Simsonn Manager, please share a screenshot so I can help you resolve it. Please make sure you’re using the latest version — SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2.            https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download     https://www.simsonn.com/pages/simsonn-product-manuals
